# featured-dropdown



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute     | Description                                                | Type       |
| ----------------- | ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `chosenOption`    | --            | Option that is shown as selected one.                      | `Option`   |
| `isExpanded`      | `is-expanded` |                                                            | `boolean`  |
| `onChangeHandler` | --            | Callback that will be called on every chosen option change | `Function` |
| `options`         | --            | List of selectable options that dropdown contains.         | `Option[]` |


## Events

| Event                  | Detail | Description                          |
| ---------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| `dropdownValueChanged` |        | Event emitted on every option change |
